item.title: MRK
item.description: score:233 Chances: FDA approval for Keytruda in combination with chemoradiotherapy for cervical cancer is a significant positive development for Merck & Co., Inc. Merck Animal Health’s positive trend in veterinarian practices and mental health underscores the company’s commitment to animal health and wellbeing.

item.title: IBRX
